EmailTemplate.name: MBO Partners and working with the Federal Government (1352753303.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners and working with the Federal Government (1352753303.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Margo, Long time no talk; I hope you are doing well. Anne Lupardo mentioned you wanted to connect with me and learn more about the way you can use MBO to win Federal business. I would love to talk to you about this. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. I look forward to speaking with you again sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
